author: Staff Reporter
text:
The district election office has received 5,585 electronic voting machines - 2,585 ballot units and 3,000 control units – from Bihar to use them in the seven assembly constituencies in the district for the forthcoming elections, according to sources here on Sunday.

These machines will be used in 1,165 polling stations. After verification, all the EVMs were kept in a strong room and sufficient force was deployed.
title: EVMs received
